plays.text: Penalty to Matt Johnson 2 minutes for High Sticking Aaron Ward
Goal scored by Aaron Ward assisted by Erik Cole and ROD BRIND'AMOUR
Penalty to Willie Mitchell 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Martin Gelinas
Penalty to Jeff Daniels 2 minutes for Interference Jim Dowd
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Shane Willis
Penalty to Aaron Ward 2 minutes for Boarding Pascal Dupuis

Penalty to Wes Walz 2 minutes for Holding Shane Willis
Goal scored by Bates Battaglia assisted by JEFF O'NEILL and Sami Kapanen
Penalty to Marek Malik 2 minutes for Crosschecking Sylvain Blouin
Penalty to Sylvain Blouin 2 minutes for Roughing Marek Malik
Penalty to Aaron Ward 2 minutes for Interference Darby Hendrickson
Penalty to JEFF O'NEILL 2 minutes for Hooking Sylvain Blouin
